DOC.brief_summary: The goal pilot study assess acceptability two online self-guided program migraine . The program part investigator ' collection `` Wireless Headache Interventions '' ( myWHI ) . The Specialized Program Headache Reduction ( SPHERE ) program teach cognitive behavioural skills/techniques help manage headache . The PeRsonalized Intervention Self-Management Migraine ( PRISM ) help user discover headache trigger provide recommendation manage . This pilot also assess feasibility study protocol inform full scale randomize control trial ( RCT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Testing myWHI : Online Self-guided Programs Migraine
DOC.criteria: age 1435 year fluent English language ( i.e. , speaking , read write ) ; suffer headache minimum one year stable pattern headache symptom ( e.g. , headache frequency , severity , location pain , symptom associate headache ) past 6 month suffer migraine headache indicate score 2 ID Migraine use Smartphone activity texting call ( e.g. , email , Facebook ) daily Internet access Smartphone minimum four headache day 4 week use electronic headache diary health care professional rule underlying medical condition relate headache ( e.g. , head trauma , meningitis ) pregnant , plan get pregnant ( next 4 6 month ) , breastfeed impairment compromise ability give inform consent diagnose psychosis and/or schizophrenia complete less 50 % daily entry ( i.e. , less 14 daily entry ) electronic headache dairy
